Dear Parents
Albeit outside of school, there's an event coming up - it looks like it will be a lot of fun and it's certainly family friendly. I wanted to forward the information below in the case that it might be of interest to you:
The St Andrews Society of Moscow invites you to Summer Stramash 2011Dear Friends and Supporters
The St Andrew Society in Moscow wishes to remind you that the Summer Stramash 2011 is on and it will be held in the Presnya Park, Ulitsa Mantulinskaya 5 and starts at 15:00 and finishes at 21:00.For your Scottish flavoured entertainment we have invited: RICKY ROSS of DEACON BLUE Fame Supported by The GOSPEL TRUTH CHOIR (T in Park) The Stramash is a FUN day out for ALL THE FAMILY with BBQ food, games and children's entertainment and large helpings of Scottish culture! (i.e. Whisky). Tickets cost 2000 roubles and are on sale from 25th July.
Children under 8 are, as always, welcome free of charge!We look forward to seeing you there on the day!
And if any one would like to help out with organization, or sponsorship all help is gratefully received!!!
In order to secure your tickets please send a request for quantities with SUBJECT RE: STRAMASH 2011 to standrewsocmoscow@gmail.com and you will receive instructions where you can purchase your tickets.We would like to thank all our sponsors and helpers who without their support this event would not be what it is today.
